version_description:
What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

It’s the first ever Homescapes update!
Enjoy our newest features:
- An in-game social network: get more of your favorite characters by following their comments and pictures!
- Austin’s story plays out in two more areas: the Orangery and the Living room
- A mailbox in your in-game tablet: get lives from your friends and read the latest news!
New in match-3 mode:
- More than 400 exciting levels!
- New elements: Soap Foamers that produce lather, and Walnuts, with shells that are very hard to crack

Here comes a cozy autumn Homescapes update!

DAILY REWARDS
- Get free coins and boosters when you log into the game.
- Log in 7 days in a row to get a special reward!

NEW IN MATCH-3 MODE
- New element: Donut maker. Make matches or explode power-ups next to it to make yummy donuts!
- Animated tutorials: find out how to make explosive combinations!
- Many new exciting levels!

ALSO FEATURING
- A new Living Room episode: help Austin uncover the secret behind great-grandpa's safe!
- A News tab in the in-game tablet: a more convenient way to learn more about offers, gifts, and power-ups!
- Community-requested feature: lives are refilled at the start of each in-game day!

Here comes a warm and cozy update!

KNITTING STORY
• The first ever in-game event: beat levels to find balls of yarn and make a warm scarf for Austin!
• Earn rewards for every part you knit and finish the scarf before the end of the event!

NEW IN MATCH-3 MODE
• Rich Suds: don't let them spread across the field!
• Window Blinds: raise the blinds by making matches next to them, unlocking the field in the process!

ALSO FEATURING
• Christmas is in the air: enjoy new holiday sketches, a Christmas tree, and gifts!
• A new part of the Living Room storyline: learn more about the hiding spot.

Here comes a winter update for Homescapes!

NEW EXPANSION
• The Garage is waiting to be explored! Fix up a classic car and participate in a parade!
• Get to know Raúl, a very kind and talented car mechanic.

NEW IN MATCH-3 MODE
• A new element: Carpet Rolls. Make matches nearby to make them unroll.
• 110 new levels.

ALSO FEATURING
• Even more pictures on the social network. Enjoy a new perspective on the Living Room!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes an exciting Homescapes update!

NEW IN THE STORYLINE
• The end of the Guest House story. Help Austin and his friends as the elements put them to the test.
• Open the Studio and get ready for a charity art exhibition.
• Meet Arthur Goodman, the severe and diligent Town Council officer!

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Magic Hat! Fill it up with pieces to clear the field!
• Tournament of Champions! A new competition for those who have beaten all the levels!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes a major Homescapes update!

JOIN A TEAM
• Team up with players from around the world.
• Chat and help each other beat levels.
• Exchange free lives and coins.

WANDERLUST DAY
• Find out the story behind Austin's family celebration. Join in on the fun starting on April 4!
• Beat the main chain of levels and levels with chests to win souvenirs from different countries that you can use to decorate the Hall!

NEW IN STORYLINE
• Is the yacht ready to set sail? Embark on an exciting journey from the Boathouse.
• Open a new house! A lovely house in the forest awaits you!
• Renovate the Lodge Hall and unravel the mystery of why the house was sold.

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Corn: collect it by matching pieces next to the container.

Enjoy a new Homescapes update!

FESTIVAL OF LIGHTS
• Celebrate the Lunar New Year with Austin starting in early February!
• Beat levels to get event tickets and win holiday decorations!
• Put up a huge paper dragon in the front yard!

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Cookie Stacks! Make matches next to the stacks to collect cookies!

NEW IN STORYLINE
• The story in the Relaxation Room continues! Help Austin learn how to meditate.
• Make masala chai together with other characters and set up a chess area for William!

Here comes a new Homescapes update!

FLYING HIGH TOURNAMENT
• Make paper planes to finish in the top and win valuable prizes
• Get to know a new character: Jerry Doyle, a tournament planner

ALSO FEATURING
• A new element: Ice Bomb. Deactivate it before it freezes the adjacent pieces
• A new part of the storyline: create your dream garage and fix a retro car
• And many other improvements

Here comes a major Homescapes update!

JOIN A TEAM
• Team up with players from around the world.
• Chat and help each other beat levels.
• Exchange free lives and coins.

WANDERLUST DAY
• Find out the story behind Austin's family celebration. Join them to mark the day on April 12!
• Beat the main chain of levels or levels with chests to win souvenirs from different countries that you can use to decorate the Hall!

NEW IN STORYLINE
• Is the yacht ready to set sail? Embark on an exciting journey from the Boathouse.
• Open a new house! A lovely house in the forest awaits you!
• Renovate the Lodge Hall and unravel the mystery of why the house was sold.

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Corn: collect it by matching pieces next to the container.
• Balls of Yarn: match pieces and activate power-ups to get the Balls into the basket.

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes a new spring update!

FURRY TALES
• Help your cat meet a lovely kitty living next door and give her a bouquet of flowers!
• Complete a special chain of levels to win pawsome rewards!

NEW IN MANSION
• Throw a surprize party for Olivia in a new room!
• Set up a dance floor and a fog machine and then hold your first rehearsal on stage!
• Enjoy the garage finale: help William get to the retro car parade!

Here comes a new spring update!

FURRY TALES
• Help your cat meet a lovely kitty living next door and give her a bouquet of flowers!
• Complete a special chain of levels to win pawsome rewards!

NEW IN MANSION
• Throw a surprize party for Olivia in a new room!
• Set up a dance floor and a fog machine and then hold your first rehearsal on stage!
• Enjoy the garage finale: help William get to the retro car parade!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes a new spring update!

FURRY TALES
• Help your cat meet a lovely kitty living next door and give her a bouquet of flowers!
• Complete a special chain of levels to win pawsome rewards!

NEW IN MANSION
• Throw a surprize party for Olivia in a new room!
• Set up a dance floor and a fog machine and then hold your first rehearsal on stage!
• Enjoy the garage finale: help William get to the retro car parade!

Here comes a new Homescapes update!

REGULAR EVENTS:
• Launch paper planes to compete with other players!
• Beat special levels to help the cat bring flowers to the love of his life and win awesome rewards!

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Tiles: match pieces and activate power-ups to destroy them!
• Ribbon with Bows: untie at least one bow to get rid of the ribbon!

NEW IN STORYLINE
• Fix the balcony and decorate the room to throw a great party for Olivia!
• The first video comics about incidents in the house! Complete star tasks to find out what happened!
• Meet Clairee Hoverson, a top-notch helicopter pilot!

Here comes a summer update!

ABOVE THE CLOUDS:
• Help Austin fly his kite in the new event on July 20!
• Beat levels on your first try to fly a kite as high as you can and get rewarded with bonuses at the beginning of the next level!

MORE REWARDS:
• Jerry's competitions now have leagues! The higher your league, the more rewards you get!
• Advance to the next league by climbing to the top of the leaderboard!

ALSO
• New element: Rings! Open Ring Boxes to remove them from the field!
• A new character: the Irish student Patrick O'Leary!
• What happened to the Elite Bookworm Club? Help write a letter to the Club Chairperson to find out!

Here comes a new update!

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Booster: Plasma Globe! Activate it to collect pieces of the same color!
• Oil Pitcher: Watch out—don't let the oil leak over onto the field!
• Ring: Match pieces and activate power-ups to find it!

FINISHING THE STORY IN THE LIBRARY
• Keep renovating the library and open a secret room!
• Help Austin and Patrick organize a movie night for their friends!
• Organize the initiation ceremony for new members of the Bookworm Club!

ALSO FEATURING
• Profile pictures for the leaderboard! Choose a picture with your favorite character in Settings!

A celebratory update to mark the birthday of Homescapes!

NEW IN THE HOUSE
• Open the wing and decorate it in marine style!
• Meet an old friend of Austin's, Robbie Wood, and help him get ready for the craftsmen festival!

ALSO FEATURING
• Enjoy gifts and offers to mark the game's birthday at the end of September!
• New element: Gramophone! Match pieces and activate power-ups next to it to collect notes!

Homescapes Halloween update!

HOMEY HALLOWEEN
• Get ready for the celebration! Take part in the spooktacular event at the end of October!
• Collect tickets, beat a unique chain of levels, and win holiday-themed decorations!
• Help Austin get the house ready for Halloween!

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Get twice as many stars and coins for beating super hard levels!
• Remove Cobwebs from tiles. Use power-ups to tidy things up!
• New element: Puzzle. Make matches to put all the Pieces of the Puzzle together and remove it from the field!

NEW IN THE STORY
• A new chapter in the Wing storyline! Build a ship for the woodworking festival with Austin and Robbie!
• Set up a sewing area and help the friends make a big balloon!

The Ho-Ho-Homescapes update!

HOLIDAY SEASON
• Help Austin decorate the house for the holidays in mid-December!
• Get tickets by beating levels to take part in an event and win holiday decorations!
• Hang stockings on the mantle and put up a holiday tree to create a festive atmosphere!

NEW IN THE STORYLINE
• The finale of the Wing area: it's time to go to the woodworking festival!
• Open the Relaxation Room and help your Homescapes friends unwind!
• Find some balance with help from Shanti, the manual therapist.

NEW IN EVENTS
• Cat Treats, the new element in our meowsome event!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes an exciting Homescapes update!

NEW IN THE STORYLINE
• The end of the Guest House story. Help Austin and his friends as the elements put them to the test.
• Open the Studio and get ready for a charity art exhibition.
• Meet Arthur Goodman, the severe and diligent Town Council officer!

NEW IN MATCH-3
• Magic Hat! Fill it up with pieces to clear the field!
• Tournament of Champions! A new competition for those who have beaten all the levels!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes a winter Homescapes update!

LUNAR NEW YEAR
• Decorate the garden for the celebration with Austin and Uncle Lao, an old family friend. The event starts at the end of January!
• Collect all the decorations to get a fountain with a dragon and a new profile picture as a reward!

NEW IN THE HOUSE
• Unlock the Dock House and help Austin save the lake from an environmental disaster!
• Begin the search for lake monster Lessie!

ALSO FEATURING
• New element: Cat House! Make matches to gather all the Kittens.

Here comes a delicious Homescapes update!

CANDY DAY
• Time to show your sweet side! A new event in early March.
• Decorate the garden to win the Candy Day decorating contest!
• Collect all the decorations to get the Royal Cake!

GOLD RUN
• Complete mini-tasks in match-3 levels to get more rewards!
• Finish all the tasks to get the grand prize: 25,000 coins!

ALSO
• Dock House: Lessie the lake monster finally makes its appearance!
• Unlock the mysterious Chamber of Wonders to solve the secrets of its ancient artifacts!
• New element: Jam Jar! Fill the Jars with colorful Jam to remove them from the field.

The latest Homescapes update is here, and it's packed with surprises!

OLIVIA'S BEDROOM
• Make Olivia's room extra cozy! A new event, starting at the beginning of May!
• Remodel the room by completing tasks and get a unique profile picture!

EVEN MORE EVENTS
• Decorate the yard for Easter together with Austin, Steven, Lucy, and Mrs. Broom. Starting on April 6!
• Season of Wonders! Complete event stages by beating levels to get rewards. Use the Golden Ticket to get a cute corgi!
• Three Chests! Beat levels to open chests with rewards!

ALSO FEATURING
• A new chapter in the story with the Chamber of Wonders bringing even more mysteries.
• New element: Refrigerator! Get soda cans out of the Refrigerator by making matches and activating power-ups!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Please update the game to the latest version.

The latest Homescapes update is here, and it's packed with surprises!

OLIVIA'S BEDROOM
• Make Olivia's room extra cozy! A new event, starting at the beginning of May!
• Remodel the room by completing tasks and get a unique profile picture!

EVEN MORE EVENTS
• Decorate the yard for Easter together with Austin, Steven, Lucy, and Mrs. Broom. Starting on April 6!
• Season of Wonders! Complete event stages by beating levels to get rewards. Use the Golden Ticket to get a cute corgi!
• Three Chests! Beat levels to open chests with rewards!

ALSO FEATURING
• A new chapter in the story with the Chamber of Wonders bringing even more mysteries.
• New element: Refrigerator! Get soda cans out of the Refrigerator by making matches and activating power-ups!

It's here—an exciting new Homescapes update!

WILD WEST
• Help Steven and Lucy build a cowboy town in a new event at the end of May!
• Get unique decorations for the yard!
• Collect all the decorations to get a cowboy statue!

ROMANTIC TERRACE
• Help William recreate his first date with Olivia!
• Renovate a jazz club terrace by completing tasks and get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• Cascade events: "Wild West" and "Coffee Break"! Beat levels and complete tasks to get rewards and event stickers!
• Finish the last chapter in the mysterious Chamber of Wonders story!
• Open a Lighthouse and turn it into a pirate's den!
• New element: Compasses! Make matches next to their active side to collect them.

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.


It's here—an exciting new Homescapes update!

WILD WEST
• Help Steven and Lucy build a cowboy town in a new event at the end of May!
• Get unique decorations for the yard!
• Collect all the decorations to get a cowboy statue!

ROMANTIC TERRACE
• Help William recreate his first date with Olivia!
• Renovate a jazz club terrace by completing tasks and get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• Cascade events: "Wild West" and "Coffee Break"! Beat levels and complete tasks to get rewards and event stickers!
• Finish the last chapter in the mysterious Chamber of Wonders story!
• Open a Lighthouse and turn it into a pirate's den!
• New element: Compasses! Make matches next to their active side to collect them.

Get ready for a spectacular Homescapes update!

MOVIE MAGIC
• Get the yard ready for a competition of film shorts
• Collect all the decorations to get a beautiful Golden Globe as a gift!
• Finish the event early to take part in Awards Night, featuring new prizes!

FAIR BOOTH
• Help Austin's family set up their own booth at the county fair!
• Earn tickets by beating levels and finish setting up the booth to get a unique profile picture.

ALSO
• Cottontail Season! Complete event stages by beating levels and get rewards! Use the Golden Ticket to win a cute bunny family!
• Cascade Events: Movie Weekend and Prize Wheel! Beat levels and complete tasks to get rewards and stickers for other events!
• The last chapter in the Lighthouse story: pirate adventures and a treasure hunt!
• New element: Ivy! Make combinations to free the puzzle field of its tendrils!

Here comes a fun Homescapes update!

OCEAN MYSTERIES
• Decorate the garden with Austin and Sandra and transform it into an undersea world!
• Collect all the decorations to get a gold submarine as a reward!
• Finish the event early to turn the Hall into the ocean floor in Seas the Day!

BAKERY
• Help Olivia's friend open her own Bakery!
• Earn tickets to finish the renovation by beating levels. Renovate half of the Bakery, and it'll be yours to keep!
• Finish the Bakery to get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• Tech Season! Complete event stages and get rewards by beating levels. Use the Golden Ticket to get a charming robot assistant!
• Cascade Events: Ocean of Rewards and Sweet Adventure! Beat levels and complete tasks to get rewards and event stickers!
• Time to roll up your sleeves on the Farm and take two cute sheep under your wing!
• New element: Steam! Make matches to remove the Steam blocking the pieces!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes a fun Homescapes update!

OCEAN MYSTERIES
• Decorate the garden with Austin and Sandra and transform it into an undersea world!
• Collect all the decorations to get a gold submarine as a reward!
• Finish the event early to turn the Hall into the ocean floor in Seas the Day!

BAKERY
• Help Olivia's friend open her own Bakery!
• Earn tickets to finish the renovation by beating levels. Renovate half of the Bakery, and it'll be yours to keep!
• Finish the Bakery to get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• Tech Season! Complete event stages and get rewards by beating levels. Use the Golden Ticket to get a charming robot assistant!
• Cascade Events: Ocean of Rewards and Sweet Adventure! Beat levels and complete tasks to get rewards and event stickers!
• Time to roll up your sleeves on the Farm and take two cute sheep under your wing!
• New element: Steam! Make matches to remove the Steam blocking the pieces!

Here comes an exciting Homescapes update!

FAIRY TALE
• Decorate the garden to transport yourself to the Land of Oz!
• Collect all the decorations to get an amazing Emerald Palace as a gift!
• Finish the event early to set up the Emerald Hall!
• Complete tasks in the Yellow Brick Road event to earn more hot air balloons, rewards, and a unique decoration!

SUMMER STAGE
• Help Austin's family prepare a stage and set up a dressing trailer for an opera singer!
• Earn tickets in levels to start decorating! Once you set up half of the Summer Stage, it'll be yours to keep!
• Finish the Summer Stage to get a special profile picture!
• Complete tasks in the Talent Show event to earn more tickets, rewards, and an animated profile picture!

ALSO
• More rewards! Earn new rewards in the Team Tournament and the Team Chest!
• Complete the last chapter in the Farm story. Help Austin prove he has what it takes to be a farmer!
• Unlock the Rock House and start setting up a radio station!
• New element: the Brooch! Make matches to restore it!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes an exciting Homescapes update!

FAIRY TALE
• Decorate the garden to transport yourself to the Land of Oz!
• Collect all the decorations to get an amazing Emerald Palace as a gift!
• Finish the event early to set up the Emerald Hall!
• Complete tasks in the Yellow Brick Road event to earn more hot air balloons, rewards, and a unique decoration!

SUMMER STAGE
• Help Austin's family prepare a stage and set up a dressing trailer for an opera singer!
• Earn tickets in levels to start decorating! Once you set up half of the Summer Stage, it'll be yours to keep!
• Finish the Summer Stage to get a special profile picture!
• Complete tasks in the Talent Show event to earn more tickets, rewards, and an animated profile picture!

ALSO
• More rewards! Earn new rewards in the Team Tournament and the Team Chest!
• Complete the last chapter in the Farm story. Help Austin prove he has what it takes to be a farmer!
• Unlock the Rock House and start setting up a radio station!
• New element: the Brooch! Make matches to restore it!

Here comes a mysterious Homescapes update!

ONCE UPON A HALLOWEEN
• Decorate the hall for Halloween with Count Dracula!
• Collect all the decorations to get the unique Spooky Mansion as a gift!
• Finish the event early to lay a Road of Horrors through the garden!
• Take part in the Big Win event to earn more candy!

COTTAGE IN THE WOODS
• Help Austin and his family decorate a cozy log cabin and picnic area and solve a chilling forest mystery!
• Earn tickets in levels to start redecorating. Complete half of the Cottage in the Woods, and it'll be yours to keep!
• Finish decorating the Cottage in the Woods to get a special profile picture!

ALSO
• Spooky Season! Beat levels to win prizes. Activate the Golden Ticket to get a Gothic organ and decorations for it!
• Horror Night cascade event! Complete tasks in match-3 levels to get a unique decoration and pumpkins for the Spooky Season
• Spooky Story returns! Collect tickets to find out what happened to Austin and his family during their trip!
• The last chapter in the Rock House story: Help make the little local radio station popular!
• New element: Light Bulbs! Make matches to collect them!

Here comes a festive Homescapes update!

MAGICAL HOLIDAYS
• Decorate the hall to grow a fir tree for the holidays!
• Collect all the decorations to make it a fairytale tree!
• Take part in the Big Win event to earn more bells!

HOLIDAY WORKSHOP
• Renovate the workshop and help Austin become Santa's helper!
• Earn tickets in levels to start renovating. Renovate half of the Holiday Workshop, and it'll be yours to keep!
• Finish renovating the Holiday Workshop to get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• New language: Brazilian Portuguese!
• Icy Season! Beat levels to win prizes. Activate the Golden Ticket to get a beautiful skating rink and decorations for it!
• Autumn's Gifts cascade event! Beat levels and complete tasks to get unique decorations!
• A new chapter! Open the Gym and help Austin get ready for the trail running competition!
• New element: Bear-in-a-Box! Make matches to open the Box and collect the Bear!

Here comes a magnificent Homescapes update!

WONDERS OF THE WORLD
• Help Jerry and William compete in a Wonders of the World knowledge face-off!
• Get garden decorations from all around the world!
• Collect all the decorations to get the Adventurer's Airship!

LAKE HOUSE
• Help renovate the lake house for the wedding anniversary of Austin's friends!
• Earn tickets in levels to start renovating. Renovate half of the Lake House, and it'll be yours to keep!
• Finish renovating the Lake House to get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• Workout Season! Beat levels to win prizes. Activate the Golden Ticket to get an exercise corner and equipment for it!
• Snowfall of Gifts cascade event! Complete tasks in levels to get a unique decoration!
• A new chapter in the story! Join Austin in the Gym and get ready for a trail running competition!
• Finish the Gym chapter to unlock a Throne Hall full of family secrets!
• New element: Cooking Pot! Make matches next to it to keep it from covering the field in steam!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements
Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes an enchanting Homescapes update!

LOVIN' PARIS
• Help Katherine have the Valentine's Day of her dreams!
• Get garden decorations from the most romantic places in Paris!
• Collect all the decorations to get the Eiffel Tower!

CLOCK TOWER STUDIO
• Help Andy renovate the studio and solve the mystery of the old clock!
• Earn tickets in levels to start renovating.
• Renovate half of the studio, and it'll be yours to keep. Finish renovating the studio to get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• Farm Season! Complete tasks in levels to win prizes. Activate the Golden Ticket to get a piglet and other awesome rewards!
• Fireworks Show cascade event! Complete tasks in levels to win a unique decoration!
• The last chapter in the Throne Hall story! Help Austin bring the family together!
• New element: Suitcase! Use power-ups to open it and get the hats!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements
Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes an enchanting Homescapes update!

LOVIN' PARIS
• Help Katherine have the Valentine's Day of her dreams!
• Get garden decorations from the most romantic places in Paris!
• Collect all the decorations to get the Eiffel Tower!

CLOCK TOWER STUDIO
• Help Andy renovate the studio and solve the mystery of the old clock!
• Earn tickets in levels to start renovating.
• Renovate half of the studio, and it'll be yours to keep. Finish renovating the studio to get a unique profile picture!

ALSO
• Farm Season! Complete tasks in levels to win prizes. Activate the Golden Ticket to get a piglet and other awesome rewards!
• Fireworks Show cascade event! Complete tasks in levels to win a unique decoration!
• The last chapter in the Throne Hall story! Help Austin bring the family together!
• New element: Suitcase! Use power-ups to open it and get the hats!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes a spectacular Homescapes update!

ROCK STAR CRIB
• Help Austin win a contest and record an album!
• Give Austin's a rockin' makeover!
• Collect all the decorations to get a Gold Record!

MAGIC TRICKS SEASON
• Help Austin put on a magic show!
• Complete tasks in levels to win prizes.
• Activate the Golden Ticket to get a magician's suit and other special rewards!

ALSO FEATURING
• William's Study! Beat regular levels or play a minigame to find a time capsule.
• Furry Ruckus cascade event! Complete tasks in levels to get loads of coins!
• A new chapter! Find out what secrets lie in the Left Wing!
• A new match-3 element: Picnic Blankets! Undo the stitches by matching pieces or activating power-ups next to the blankets

Get ready for a Homescapes update full of adventure!

CHARLES BARROW'S ADVENTURE
• Turn the yard into a recreation of Charles Barrow's legendary voyage.
• Beautify the yard with decorations from Charles's adventure!
• Collect all the decorations to unearth the eighth wonder of the world!

TROPICAL PARADISE
• Help Sandra set up a beach campground and teach Chloe to dive!
• Earn tickets in levels to create the campground.
• The campground will be yours to keep if you finish half of the tasks. Get a unique profile picture if you complete all the tasks.

ALSO
• The Puppet Theater Season! Get prizes by completing tasks. Activate the Golden Ticket to get a puppet theater and other prizes!
• The Flower Market cascade event! Complete tasks in match-3 levels to get a unique decoration!
• A new chapter in the main storyline! Reveal the final mysteries of the Left Wing of the estate!
• Unlock the Mineral Spring and discover its remarkable properties!
• New element: Blankets! Undo the stitches by matching pieces or activating power-ups!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Here comes a touching Homescapes update!

RETRO PARTY
• Throw an old-school dance party!
• Beautify the hall with decorations from the past!
• Collect all the decorations to get a rockabilly dance floor!

AUSTIN'S NURSERY
• Help William and Olivia renovate Austin's nursery to learn its amazing story.
• Earn tickets in levels to renovate the room.
• The room will be yours to keep if you finish half of the tasks. Get a unique profile picture for completing all the tasks!

ALSO
• Pawsome Season! Get prizes by completing tasks. Activate the Golden Ticket to get a Labrador and other great prizes!
• The Citrus Garden cascade event! Complete tasks in match-3 levels to get a unique decoration!
• The last chapter in the Mineral Spring story! Open the mineral resort!
• The new Fruit Drink element! Make matches of the right color to clear it!

Here comes a dressed-up Homescapes update!

VENICE CARNIVAL
• Throw a romantic carnival for Robbie and Melinda!
• Beautify the yard with carnival decorations!
• Collect them all to build a unique fountain!

FLOWER SHOP
• Help Austin and Katherine restore an old flower shop to keep it from being demolished.
• Earn tickets in levels to renovate the shop.
• The shop will be yours to keep if you finish half of the tasks. Get a unique profile picture for completing all the tasks!

ALSO
• Dance Season! Get prizes by completing tasks. Activate the Golden Ticket to get a dance floor and other great prizes!
• Prize Race cascade event! Complete tasks in levels to get a unique decoration!
• A new chapter! Restore the theater in the castle and find out if it really is cursed!
